short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps fellow Neopians preload battledome weapons when fighting opponents in Battledome, 2 presave slots are available!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Neopets Battledome currently does not have a preset for weapons to be saved, that is a manual process of required to click at least 6 times to complete a battle. This extension will save 2 sets of Battledome equipments and fellow you number of clicks during battle!


If you encounter any bugs, please let us know via the support tab on the Chrome Web Store listing.
